API Contacts

async api.contacts.create_contact(contact: ContactCreate, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))[source]

Create a new contact for the current user.

Parameters:

  • contact – ContactCreate schema with new contact data.

  • db – Async SQLAlchemy session.

  • current_user – The authenticated user.

Returns:

Created contact.

async api.contacts.delete_contact(contact_id: int, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))[source]

Delete a contact by ID.

Parameters:

  • contact_id – ID of the contact to delete.

  • db – Async SQLAlchemy session.

  • current_user – The authenticated user.

Returns:

Deleted contact if found, otherwise 404.

async api.contacts.get_contact(contact_id: int, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))[source]

Retrieve a specific contact by ID.

Parameters:

  • contact_id – The ID of the contact to retrieve.

  • db – Async SQLAlchemy session.

  • current_user – The authenticated user.

Returns:

Contact if found, otherwise 404 error.

async api.contacts.get_upcoming_birthdays(db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))[source]

Get contacts with upcoming birthdays within the next 7 days.

Parameters:

  • db – Async SQLAlchemy session.

  • current_user – The authenticated user.

Returns:

List of contacts with upcoming birthdays.

async api.contacts.list_contacts(skip: int = 0, limit: int = 10, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))[source]

Retrieve a paginated list of the current user’s contacts.

Parameters:

  • skip – Number of records to skip (pagination).

  • limit – Maximum number of records to return.

  • db – Async SQLAlchemy session.

  • current_user – The authenticated user.

Returns:

List of contacts.

async api.contacts.search_contacts(query: str = Query(PydanticUndefined), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))[source]

Search for contacts by a given text query (name, email, etc.).

Parameters:

  • query – Search string.

  • db – Async SQLAlchemy session.

  • current_user – The authenticated user.

Returns:

List of matching contacts.

async api.contacts.update_contact(contact_id: int, contact: ContactUpdate, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))[source]

Update an existing contact’s information.

Parameters:

  • contact_id – ID of the contact to update.

  • contact – Updated data in ContactUpdate schema.

  • db – Async SQLAlchemy session.

  • current_user – The authenticated user.

Returns:

Updated contact if found, otherwise 404.
